hints.content: Let's try each strategy one at a time to see if they work.

Add $2+4$ then add $40$.

$\begin{align}
\blueE{32}+\purpleD{14}&=\blueE{30}+\blueE{2}+\purpleD{10}+\purpleD4\\\\
&= \blueE{2}+\purpleD{4}+\blueE{30}+\purpleD{10}\\\\
&= \blueE{2}+\purpleD{4}+40
\end{align}$


**Yes**, this strategy works.

**The following strategy can be used to add $32+14$.**

- Add $2+4$ then add $40$.
